person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Cuttitta , who trainer George Coste said was certain to play on Saturday week , was named in a 21-man squad lacking only two of the team beaten 54-21 by England at Twickenham last month .

Let's think step by step.

1. Cuttitta
2. George Coste (although he is mentioned as "George Coste" in the text, I would still classify it as a single "Person" entity, since "George" is a common first name and "Coste" is an uncommon last name, so it's likely that there is only one person with this name)

Therefore, the "Person" entities in the given paragraph are "Cuttitta" and "George Coste".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Cuttitta
2. George Coste

These are the entities that clearly refer to a Person. The other entities in the text, such as "21-man squad" and "Twickenham" do not refer to people, so they are not relevant in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
